channel.title: Pavillion || PvP Eco || 718/738!
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://pavillionrsps.com/images/logo.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://pavillionrsps.com"] Click here for Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://forums.pavillionrsps.com/"] Clickl here for Forums[/URL]
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=- SERVER IS ONLINE -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
CACHE UPDATED TO 738;[
About us-
Pavillion was started as a small server in the summer of 2012, but eventually went down. It is now being brought back as a completely new, revolutionary server created by Maxed. We are a 718 loading 738 server and we strive to become and WILL become the #1 RSPS ever. With loads of features, a friendly community, and a helpful staff team, it’s easy to set ourselves apart from what you’d call “the competition”. We PROMISE you that in no time, you will become part of the Pavillion family. Whether a pker, a merchant, a skiler, or a bosser - Pavillion is for you! Anything you dreamt to have in a server, pavillion brings to life.
Staff spots are open.. so come on and have a go (: [Don't ask in game, submit your application]
Other features - Grand Exchange - Webclient - Working Vote & Rewards - Automatic Donating System! - Stable economy - 100% Up time - Active Clean Forums - Working lodestones with custom demon teleport! - No lag - Constant Updates - Professional and active Staff - Most unique RSPS - Daily updates! - Old and new Runescape Armor - Perfect pking - Fast and smooth switches - 10x hits - Summoning with working familiars - All dupes fixed - Gambling - Working flowers and dice - Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic - 138 combat, summoning counts - Hairdresser - Makeover Mage - Working Squeal of Fortune - Working money pouch - Clanchat working - All Auras work with a loyality point system - PKP System! - & So much more!
Our main feature is that we are PvP Economy with great of cool features!
[CENTER]Pvp Out of bank[/CENTER] [IMG]http://i1130.photobucket.com/albums/m534/Jonathandeprof/image2.jpg[/img] [CENTER]Grand - Exchange![/CENTER] [IMG]http://i1130.photobucket.com/albums/m534/Jonathandeprof/image1.jpg[/img]
[CENTER]Fully Working Nex!![/CENTER] [IMG]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/3748/lightshotd.png[/img]
[CENTER]Pk Points shop!!![/CENTER] [IMG]http://i1130.photobucket.com/albums/m534/Jonathandeprof/pkpointshop.png[/img]
[CENTER]::PVP for Dangerous PVP![/CENTER] [IMG]http://i1130.photobucket.com/albums/m534/Jonathandeprof/pvp-dangerous.png[/img]
[CENTER]Heres a quick trailer (: [url=http://youtu.be/-RB36VGA7vI]PavillionRSPS | RuneScape Private Server - YouTube[/url] [/CENTER] [IMG]http://pavillionrsps.com/images/logo.png[/img]

About us-

Pavillion was started as a small server in the summer of 2012, but eventually went down. It is now being brought back as a completely new, revolutionary server created by Maxed. We are a 718 loading 738 server and we strive to become and WILL become the #1 RSPS ever. With loads of features, a friendly community, and a helpful staff team, it’s easy to set ourselves apart from what you’d call “the competition”. We PROMISE you that in no time, you will become part of the Pavillion family. Whether a pker, a merchant, a skiler, or a bosser - Pavillion is for you! Anything you dreamt to have in a server, pavillion brings to life.

Staff spots are open… so come on and have a go (: [Don’t ask in game, submit your application]

Other features

  • Grand Exchange
  • Webclient
  • Working Vote & Rewards
  • Automatic Donating System!
  • Stable economy
  • 100% Up time
  • Active Clean Forums
  • Working lodestones with custom demon teleport!
  • No lag
  • Constant Updates
  • Professional and active Staff
  • Most unique RSPS
  • Daily updates!
  • Old and new Runescape Armor
  • Perfect pking
  • Fast and smooth switches
  • 10x hits
  • Summoning with working familiars
  • All dupes fixed

  • Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic
  • 138 combat, summoning counts
  • Hairdresser
  • Makeover Mage
  • Working Squeal of Fortune
  • Working money pouch
  • Clanchat working
  • All Auras work with a loyality point system
  • PKP System!
  • & So much more!

Our main feature is that we are PvP Economy with great of cool features!
